data.message:
50 CENT HEARTS EMINEM AFTER ALL THESE YEARS: “EM IS STILL MY FAVORITE WHITE BOY”
Jan 16, 2016Biz Jones News
G-Unit boss 50 Cent showed some love to longtime friend and hip-hop mentor Eminem this weekend on social media.
Fif posted up a picture of himself and Slim Shady to Instagram Saturday (January 16) and dished out admiration.
https://www.sohh.com/50-cent-hearts-eminem-after-all-the…/2/
